titleStmt.title: The case of the dissenting Protestants of Ireland, in reference to a Bill of Indulgence, vindicated from the exceptions alledg'd against it, in a late answer. / By Ioseph Boyse.
titleStmt.author: Boyse, J. (Joseph), 1660-1728.

notesStmt.note: Author's name written in under title.
Imperfect: faded, with some loss of text.
Place and date of publication taken from Wing (2nd ed.)
Reproduction of original in: Bodleian Library.
